Here is the list of signs at $LINE, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural leaders, Aries tend to be bold and confident, but can also come across as pushy or arrogant.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable and practical, Tauruses are known for their stability and sense of responsibility, but can also be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis are natural communicators with a flair for creativity, but can also be restless and easily distracted.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotional and nurturing, Cancers prioritize family and home life, but can also be moody and overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos are natural performers with a flair for drama, but can also come across as arrogant or self-centered.
6. Virgo - 9/10 - Analytical and hardworking, Virgos are known for their attention to detail and practicality, but can also be perfectionistic and overly critical.
7. Libra - 8/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans prioritize fairness and balance in all aspects of life, but can also be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 9/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpions are natural detectives with a keen sense of intuition, but can also be controlling and vengeful.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and freedom-loving, Sagittarians are known for their optimism and enthusiasm, but can also be reckless and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 8/10 - Ambitious and responsible, Capricorns prioritize hard work and discipline, but can also come across as aloof or distant.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians are known for their innovative thinking and unconventional approach, but can also be rebellious and uncooperative.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces prioritize creativity and spirituality, but can also be dreamy and easily distracted.
